channel.title: PI 634 npc
channel.description: Added 634 npc but when i log in i got this: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/vhyk2t.png[/img] And cmd gives me error and client freezes when i click on that npc. Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.build3dScreenMenu(client.java:4940) at client.processRightClick(client.java:6385) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9225) at client.method146(client.java:12274) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8444) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9155) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4846) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: PI 634 npc
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

Added 634 npc but when i log in i got this:

And cmd gives me error and client freezes when i click on that npc.
